hero.subTitle: Marketplace featuring Influencers and Creative Freedom
hero.title: Custom Stuff from your Favorite Influencers
hero.imageText1: Our marketplace provides unique and personalized clothing options for customers while also supporting independent creators and designers.
hero.imageText2: We prioritize sustainability and ethical practices in their production process, by using eco-friendly materials and ensuring fair labour practices.

complete.gratitudeBanner: Thank you. Your order has been received.

supportModal.subTitle: Contact us
supportModal.title: Get in touch
supportModal.message: We’d love to hear from you. Please fill out this form.

form.zipErrorInvalid: Zip code must be a number
form.submitCompleteMessage: Thank you for contacting us! We have received your message and will reply as soon as possible.

footer.infoMessage: Shop the latest trends and styles from our marketplace, and stand out with unique and personalized printed clothes.

getExclusiveOffers.title: Get Exclusive Offers!
getExclusiveOffers.message: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive exclusive content, special discounts, and be the first to know about new releases from our marketplace.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introductionPrt1: This Privacy Policy describes how Kram Market collects, uses, and shares personal information of users of this website, located at
privacy.introductionPrt2: (the “Site”). By using this Site, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information as described in this Privacy Policy.
privacy.infoCollection: We collect information from you when you register on our Site or place an order. When ordering or registering on our Site, as appropriate, you may be asked to enter your name, email address, mailing address, phone number or credit card information. We will not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personally identifiable information to outside parties.
privacy.infoSharing: We do not share personal information with third parties except as necessary to carry out our business or as required by law or other legal processes.
privacy.cookies: We use cookies to help us remember and process the items in your shopping cart and compile aggregate data about site traffic and site interaction so that we can offer better site experiences and tools in the future.
privacy.security: We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information when you place an order or enter, submit, or access your personal information.
privacy.changePolicy: Kram Market may change this Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make changes, we will notify you by revising the date at the top of the policy and, in some cases, we may provide you with additional notice (such as adding a statement to our homepage or sending you an email notification).

reviews.subTitle: Reviews
reviews.title: What Our Valuable Clients Say About Us
reviews.redMessage: I never thought online shopping could be so fun! Thanks to KRAM, I can now buy all the things I need without leaving my den
reviews.darkGreenMessage: KRAM is the bamboo to my appetite for online shopping! Fast delivery, excellent customer service, and the cutest products.
reviews.greenMessage: Hop hop hooray for KRAM! I was a little hesitant to buy online, but KRAM made it so easy and enjoyable. Carrots never tasted so good!
reviews.purpleMessage: I usually take my time to make decisions, but with KRAM, I don't have to! Their products are just what I need, and the delivery is so fast, I don't even have to leave my tree.
